name: Table Piano
description: The drum set toy allows children to unleash their inner drummer and create rhythmic beats.

name: Guiter Toy
description: The Guiter toy introduces kids to basic music concepts while having fun playing colorful keys.

name: Singing and Dancing Bear
description: The singing and dancing bear toy brings joy and entertainment with its catchy tunes and dance moves.

name: Musical Penguin
description: The musical penguin toy sings and dances, capturing children's imagination and creating a delightful playtime experience.

name: Classic Music Box
description: The classic music box plays beautiful melodies and features an intricate design that delights both young and old.

name: Animal Carousel Music Box
description: The animal carousel music box mesmerizes with its rotating figures and enchanting tunes, creating a magical experience.
